alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 8:11PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, northern Ellsworth, southern Russell and northwestern Barton Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 811 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Lincoln to near Victoria. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilson, Lincoln, Sylvan Grove, Dorrance, Beverly, Milberger, Bunker Hill, Galatia, Susank, Westfall, Wilson State Park, and Wilson Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 187 and 235. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
